price: Si no creen, no podrán librarse del castigo del día terrible [del Juicio], que hará encanecer hasta a los niños.
arabic: فَكَيۡفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرۡتُمۡ يَوۡمٗا يَجۡعَلُ ٱلۡوِلۡدَٰنَ شِيبًا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: fakayfa tattaqūna in kafartum yawman yajʿalu al-wil'dāna shīban
